text:
If a JSP page is called with no query string and I try to check for the
existance of a particular tag with <req:existsQueryString ...> I get a
NullPointerException from ExistsQueryStringTag.java:117 calling
java.util.StringTokenizer. Looking at the code it doesn't check that the
querystring isn't null before trying to tokenize it, it should be a trivial
change to fix this.
creator: tim@ngame.com
glenn@apache.org
text:
Thanks for reporting this. Sorry it took so long for me to get to it.
Fixed and will be in the next nightly build.
